name: Protector (UnitedCatdom)
description:
Some family went on a holiday for two weeks. They paid you to stay in their possession to make sure no one breaks into their house. This is a bit haunted place and at night weird things happens. They gave you their not used building as a security building. You have old flat monitor, radio and CCTV system which enough for your job. Your goal is to survive 5 minutes without being killed by trespasser.

Main Features:

- Time Synchronisation - Game time synchronises with your Local time

- As time changes the difficulty changes too

- Working radio with ability to play custom music (place .mp3 files in cmusic folder where your game is located. if there's no any folder named this way, create it)

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS BETA

Can include bugs. We understand you paid for it, but remember - this game is still in development and will receive updates.

Facts:

- Creating the game (until first release) took us 3 days!

- (until first release) there were only two Developers creating the game

Tips:

- Turn on lights when you see trespasser near house's door

- Turn off lights when trespasser is nearby

- Save energy

Console:

- foliage [0/1] - Turns off / on foliage to boost fps

- border [0/1] - Turns off / on brick walls around possesion

- fps [value[ - Captures FPS (0 for unlimited)

- hud [0/1] - Shows / hides HUD
